item.description:
Join us at our December BostonLOA Meetup to CELEBRATE 2007.

Come share "shamelessly" what you HAVE deliberately manifested
this year... or in the process of manifesting

We look forward to REJOICE & CELEBRATE with you.

We are very thankful that we have deliberately attracted you folks
into our lives this year.

much JOY!

ChewHoong & Dave

p.s. (1) You're welcome to bring a Law Of Attraction-related GIFT to exchange.
This is OPTIONAL.

If you decide to bring a gift, wrap it or put it in a gift bag.
Include a card that it's from you or remain anonymous.

(2) Please wear clothes that will allow you to sit comfortably on the floor.

(3) Bring an appetizer to share. We will provide the desserts.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction December Meetup
